content.sql:
SELECT 
  SUM(sod.linetotal) as total_revenue
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh 
  ON sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid
WHERE soh.orderdate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '12 months'
content.name: Total Sales Revenue
content.description: What is the total sales revenue over the last 12 months?

content.sql:

INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh

content.sql:
SELECT 
    clv.customerid, 
    clv.metric_clv_all_time, 
    CASE 
        WHEN p.firstname IS NOT NULL THEN p.firstname || ' ' || p.lastname 
        ELSE 'Customer ' || clv.customerid::text 
    END AS customer_name
FROM postgres.ont_ont.customer_all_time_clv clv
LEFT JOIN postgres.ont_ont.customer cust ON clv.customerid = cust.customerid
LEFT JOIN postgres.ont_ont.person p ON cust.personid = p.businessentityid
ORDER BY clv.metric_clv_all_time DESC
LIMIT 1
content.name: Top Customer by Lifetime Value
content.description: Identifies our highest value customer based on total lifetime revenue

content.sql:

LEFT JOIN postgres.ont_ont.customer cust ON clv.customerid = cust.customerid
LEFT JOIN postgres.ont_ont.person p ON cust.personid = p.businessentityid
ORDER BY clv.metric_clv_all_time DESC
LIMIT 1

content.sql:
SELECT 
  AVG(order_total) as avg_order_value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    soh.salesorderid,
    SUM(sod.linetotal) as order_total
  FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod
  INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh 
    ON sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid
  WHERE soh.orderdate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '12 months'
  GROUP BY soh.salesorderid
) order_totals
content.name: Average Order Value
content.description: What is the average order value over the last 12 months?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  AVG(order_total) as avg_order_value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    soh.salesorderid,
    SUM(sod.linetotal) as order_total
  FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod
  INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh 
    ON sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid
  WHERE soh.orderdate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '12 months'
  GROUP BY soh.salesorderid
) order_totals

content.sql:
SELECT 
  (SUM(sod.unitprice * sod.orderqty * (1 - sod.unitpricediscount)) - 
   SUM(p.standardcost * sod.orderqty)) / 
  NULLIF(SUM(sod.unitprice * sod.orderqty * (1 - sod.unitpricediscount)), 0) * 100 as gross_profit_margin
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh 
  ON sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.product p 
  ON sod.productid = p.productid
WHERE soh.orderdate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '12 months'
content.name: Gross Profit Margin
content.description: What is the gross profit margin percentage over the last 12 months?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  (SUM(sod.unitprice * sod.orderqty * (1 - sod.unitpricediscount)) - 
   SUM(p.standardcost * sod.orderqty)) / 
  NULLIF(SUM(sod.unitprice * sod.orderqty * (1 - sod.unitpricediscount)), 0) * 100 as gross_profit_margin
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh 
  ON sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.product p 
  ON sod.productid = p.productid
WHERE soh.orderdate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '12 months'
content.name: Gross Profit Margin
content.description: What is the gross profit margin percentage over the last 12 months?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(CASE WHEN soh.shipdate <= soh.duedate THEN soh.salesorderid END) * 100.0 / 
  NULLIF(COUNT(soh.salesorderid), 0) as fulfillment_rate
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh
WHERE soh.orderdate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '12 months'
  AND soh.shipdate IS NOT NULL
  AND soh.duedate IS NOT NULL
content.name: Order Fulfillment Rate
content.description: What percentage of orders were fulfilled on or before the due date in the last 12 months?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(CASE WHEN soh.shipdate <= soh.duedate THEN soh.salesorderid END) * 100.0 / 
  NULLIF(COUNT(soh.salesorderid), 0) as fulfillment_rate
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh
WHERE soh.orderdate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '12 months'
  AND soh.shipdate IS NOT NULL
  AND soh.duedate IS NOT NULL
content.name: Order Fulfillment Rate
content.description: What percentage of orders were fulfilled on or before the due date in the last 12 months?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  clv.customerid,
  CONCAT(p.firstname, ' ', p.lastname) AS customer_name,
  clv.metric_clv_all_time AS lifetime_value
FROM postgres.ont_ont.customer_all_time_clv clv
LEFT JOIN postgres.ont_ont.customer c ON clv.customerid = c.customerid
LEFT JOIN postgres.ont_ont.person p ON c.personid = p.businessentityid
ORDER BY clv.metric_clv_all_time DESC
LIMIT 1
content.name: Top Customer by Lifetime Value
content.description: Identifies the customer with the highest all-time lifetime value

LEFT JOIN postgres.ont_ont.customer c ON clv.customerid = c.customerid

name: Most Frequent Purchases by Top Customer
fileName: Most Frequent Purchases by Top Customer

content.sql:
WITH top_customer AS (
  SELECT customerid
  FROM postgres.ont_ont.customer_all_time_clv
  ORDER BY metric_clv_all_time DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT 
  p.name AS product_name,
  COUNT(DISTINCT soh.salesorderid) AS order_count
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod ON soh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.product p ON sod.productid = p.productid
WHERE soh.customerid = (SELECT customerid FROM top_customer)
GROUP BY p.name
ORDER BY order_count DESC
LIMIT 10
content.name: Most Frequent Purchases by Top Customer
content.description: Shows the products most frequently purchased by the top customer based on number of orders containing each product

content.sql:
WITH top_customer AS (
  SELECT customerid
  FROM postgres.ont_ont.customer_all_time_clv
  ORDER BY metric_clv_all_time DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT 
  p.name AS product_name,
  COUNT(DISTINCT soh.salesorderid) AS order_count
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod ON soh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.product p ON sod.productid = p.productid
WHERE soh.customerid = (SELECT customerid FROM top_customer)
GROUP BY p.name
ORDER BY order_count DESC
LIMIT 10
content.name: Most Frequent Purchases by Top Customer
content.description: Shows the products most frequently purchased by the top customer based on number of orders containing each product

content.sql:
SELECT 
  SUM(tsr.metric_totalsalesrevenue) as total_revenue
FROM postgres.ont_ont.total_sales_revenue tsr
WHERE tsr.year = 2025 
  AND tsr.month >= 4 
  AND tsr.month <= 9
content.name: Total Sales Revenue Last 6 Months
content.description: What is the total sales revenue for the last 6 months?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  tsr.month,
  tsr.year,
  tsr.metric_totalsalesrevenue as revenue
FROM postgres.ont_ont.total_sales_revenue tsr
WHERE tsr.year = 2025 
  AND tsr.month >= 4 
  AND tsr.month <= 9
ORDER BY tsr.year ASC, tsr.month ASC
content.name: Monthly Sales Trend
content.description: What is the monthly sales revenue trend over the last 6 months?

content.sql:

content.sql:
SELECT 
  st.name as territory_name,
  SUM(sod.linetotal) as territory_sales
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod 
  ON soh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_territory st 
  ON soh.territoryid = st.territoryid
WHERE soh.orderdate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 months'
GROUP BY st.territoryid, st.name
ORDER BY territory_sales DESC
LIMIT 10
content.name: Sales by Territory Top 10
content.description: What are the top 10 territories by sales in the last 6 months?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  st.name as territory_name,
  SUM(sod.linetotal) as territory_sales
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod 
  ON soh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_territory st 
  ON soh.territoryid = st.territoryid
WHERE soh.orderdate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 months'
GROUP BY st.territoryid, st.name
ORDER BY territory_sales DESC
LIMIT 10
content.name: Sales by Territory Top 10
content.description: What are the top 10 territories by sales in the last 6 months?

SELECT 
  SUM(pi.quantity) as total_inventory_quantity
FROM postgres.ont_ont.product_inventory pi
content.name: Total Current Inventory
content.description: What is the total current inventory quantity across all products and locations?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  SUM(pod.orderqty - pod.receivedqty) as incoming_inventory_quantity
FROM postgres.ont_ont.purchase_order_detail pod
WHERE pod.orderqty > pod.receivedqty
content.name: Total Incoming Inventory
content.description: What is the total incoming inventory quantity on open purchase orders?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  SUM(pod.orderqty - pod.receivedqty) as incoming_inventory_quantity
FROM postgres.ont_ont.purchase_order_detail pod
WHERE pod.orderqty > pod.receivedqty
content.name: Total Incoming Inventory
content.description: What is the total incoming inventory quantity on open purchase orders?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  COALESCE(SUM(sod.orderqty), 0) as outgoing_inventory_quantity
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod ON soh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid
WHERE soh.status < 5
content.name: Total Outgoing Inventory
content.description: What is the total outgoing inventory quantity on unshipped sales orders?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  COALESCE(SUM(sod.orderqty), 0) as outgoing_inventory_quantity
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod ON soh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid
WHERE soh.status < 5
content.name: Total Outgoing Inventory
content.description: What is the total outgoing inventory quantity on unshipped sales orders?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  SUM(sod.orderqty) as inventory_shipped_quantity
FROM postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_header soh
INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod ON soh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid
WHERE soh.shipdate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days'
content.name: Inventory Shipped Last 30 Days
content.description: What is the total inventory quantity shipped in the last 30 days?

content.sql:
SELECT 
  SUM(sod.orderqty) as inventory_shipped_quantity

INNER JOIN postgres.ont_ont.sales_order_detail sod ON soh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid
WHERE soh.shipdate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days'
content.name: Inventory Shipped Last 30 Days
content.description: What is the total inventory quantity shipped in the last 30 days?
